sentences.english: Mongols live in Mongolia autonomous region. They like wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古族人居住在内蒙古自治区，喜欢摔跤。

sentences.english: Chestnut soil is one of the main types of soil in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 栗钙土是内蒙古自治区最重要的一种土壤类型。

sentences.english: This research is one of programs of Natural Science Fundation Committee of Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 本研究是内蒙古自治区自然科学基金课题。

sentences.english: Hotels have won the three-star hotel in Inner Mongolia best title.
sentences.chinese: 宾馆曾三次荣获内蒙古自治区最佳星级饭店称号。

sentences.english: People's Government of Ewenke, administrative division of the county level, in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 内蒙古自治区鄂温克族自治旗人民政府。

sentences.english: Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region is briefly named as Inner Mongolia with Hohhot as its capital city.
sentences.chinese: 内蒙古自治区简称内蒙古，省会城市是呼和浩特。

sentences.english: Inner-Mongolia is located in the peripheral area of the Monsoon climate region.
sentences.chinese: 内蒙古自治区地处季风气候边缘区。

sentences.english: Huhhot is the capital of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 呼和浩特是内蒙古自治区的首府。
